title: is there supposed to be a playable part somewhere?
body:
Whatever the team composition Im doing, my teams do zero damage but get one shot
am I supposed to do something during the fights?

edit : lol they all got rekt by... WOLVES... They didn't kill a single one

replies.body:
You could start by looking up how to play TFT, because you are doing something wildly wrong.

And no, it is "played" entirely during setup, the battles are at the mercy of wild RNG.
